name: Dark Frontier
description:
Now without IAP; a True Premium Game!

Protect the Realm against the hordes! Recruit your heroes, prepare your weapons and use all your power to defeat the incoming enemies.

Classic RPG monsters and heroes!

Advance through 100 Levels on 10 different maps.
Battle zombies, goblins orcs, ogres, skeletons, spiders, and more!

Compatible with iPhone 4 and up, iPad 2 and up.

Highlights:

- 4 worlds with 10 different maps
- Over 40 enemies types, including 10 bosses
- Over 30 heroes
- Traps, walls and amazing powers
- 100 levels
- Unique music and sounds
- High-quality 3d graphics

IN APP PURCHASES: No In-App Purchase in this Premium Game!
